summary: The module constructs and manipulates an inâ€‘memory directed graph that models Terraform configuration elements and their relationships, handling advanced constructs such as loops, interpolations, and encryption metadata, and can translate this graph back into structured Terraform definition objects enriched with contextual information.
business_intent: Provide a robust representation of Terraform code for static analysis, security scanning, and policy enforcement by enabling dependency tracing, impact assessment, and reconstruction of configuration data.
